The last 1% or so of this torrent is very slow to download as there is a huge amount of rubbish data out there. So far I am at 99.5% and to get 0.2% I have received 150Mb with 145Mb of that being rubbish data! Fortunately, I have found that all the files play all the way through with 99% of each file downloaded. For this download I have over 1Gb of rubbish data which is a huge amount to say the least.
